definition: a written message addressed to a person or organization, mark letters on or mark with letters
details:
noun
- a written message addressed to a person or organization
= example: a written message addressed to a person or organization
= synonyms: missive
- an award earned by participation in a school sport
= example: an award earned by participation in a school sport
= synonyms: varsity letter
- the conventional characters of the alphabet used to represent speech
= example: the conventional characters of the alphabet used to represent speech
= synonyms: letter of the alphabet, alphabetic character
- a strictly literal interpretation, as distinct from the intention
= example: a strictly literal interpretation, as distinct from the intention
- owner who lets another person use something (housing usually) for hire
verb
- mark letters on or mark with letters
- set down or print with letters
- win an athletic letter
